verse.name: v1
verse.lines: "Man of Sorrows," what a name for the Son of God who came ruined sinners to reclaim! Hallelujah! what a Savior!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Bearing shame and scoffing rude, in my place condemned He stood, sealed my pardon with His blood; Hallelujah! what a Savior!

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Lifted up was He to die, "It is finished," was His cry; now in heav'n exalted high' Hallelujah! what a Savior!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: When He comes, our glorious King, all His ransomed home to bring, then anew this song we'll sing: Hallelujah! what a Savior!
